extendedInfo.description: You don't want to miss this one! The 2013 R4 Convention is setting up to be the biggest RE/MAX event of all time. Where else would you have the opportunity to listen to the wisdom of Dr. Condoleezza Rice and enjoy private concerts by Stevie Nicks and Kenny Loggins? That's just a taste of what's in store as RE/MAX welcomes thousands of Associates from around the world to Las Vegas in celebration of the network's 40th anniversary. Join us, February 25-28, 2013 at the MGM Grand Hotel & Casino.Keywords: RE/MAX remax r4 convention conference 40th anniversary dave liniger

reviews.title: Nice App
reviews.comment: Need to make the maps bigger as they don\'t even cover 1/4 of my 4\" screen of my Motorola XT860. Get that fixed & you get another star. RE/MAX Rocks!  Mike Muranetz
reviews.author: Mike Muranetz

reviews.title: Works Sometimes...
reviews.comment: My frustration level is usually low until I find myself waiting for an app to restart after locking up. Sometimes it\'s ok but if it is quirky now, wait until we are all on it during R4. Fix now and watch the world\'s best real estate professionals smile.
reviews.author: Quincy Clayton

reviews.title: R4 app..
reviews.comment: Better than last year\'s app, but still a few changes I\'d make. All in all a good app considering it\'ll only get used this week..
reviews.author: david wade

reviews.title: Fix bug, then it will be useful
reviews.comment: Worked fine originally in regards to maps and overall info about convention but when you enter the code for the contacts section it freezes and won\'t save your info and the app crashes...   a month later, no fix yet, convention around the corner
reviews.author: Bennett Clark

reviews.title: Still not working!
reviews.comment: Downloaded three times, and the app is still having issues!
reviews.author: Heather Parness

reviews.title: Droid Razr Max
reviews.comment: Does not work. Did have the classes and events when first downloaded now all classes are gone. Tried deleting and reinstalling several times. No stars deserved.
reviews.author: Bill Davis

reviews.title: App not working
reviews.comment: App not working, keeps giving error message, had to uninstall on Droid
reviews.author: angela duncan
